meta_description: Treatment of the integrable singular terms in the calculation of the self
energy. Values: 'mpb' - Auxiliary function method by S. Massidda, M. Posternak,
and A. Baldereschi, PRB 48, 5058 (1993); 'crg' - Auxiliary function method by
P. Carrier, S. Rohra, and A. Goerling, PRB 75, 205126
